definition: breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
to grow and multiply without end
the stream flows without stopping (idiom); unending flow
while there is life, the fight continues (idiom); to fight to the last
pinyin: sheng1 ming4 bu4 xi1 , zhan4 dou4 bu4 zhi3

sentences.english: The spring water is of dark green, deep and running all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 泉水碧綠凝重，深不見底，終年湧流不息。

sentences.english: To de fend our country we must strengthen ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 爲了保衛祖國，我們必須自強不息。

sentences.english: Is flowing rapidly rest Dujiang weirs not to have our happy song joke.
sentences.chinese: 在奔流不息的都江堰有我們的歡歌笑語。

sentences.english: Of insects in the windrows of the hay.
sentences.chinese: 在乾草中嗡嗡不息的吵鬧？

sentences.english: Sadness was never-ending in Sichuan province after the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 地震後的四川，流淌着川流不息的悲傷。

sentences.english: There was prolonged applause when he began to speak.
sentences.chinese: 他開始講話時響起了經久不息的掌聲。

sentences.english: The males make a loud croaking sound that can be heard during the night.
sentences.chinese: 其雄性蛙類會發出響亮的聒噪聲，徹夜不息。

sentences.english: Cease not your moaning you fierce old mother.
sentences.chinese: 不息的轟隆似憤怒老母。

sentences.english: They were still applauding when the curtain rang down for the final time.
sentences.chinese: 最後一次鳴鈴落幕時，他們的掌聲依然不息。

sentences.english: Each of us is a star shines in the sky of Sina.
sentences.chinese: 每個你我，都是一顆星星，在新浪的天空裏生生不息。

sentences.english: Oral epics are a lasting cultural phenomenon among nations all around the world.
sentences.chinese: 口傳史詩是世界上許多民族都流傳不息的文化現象。

sentences.english: However, Yan Yuan's distinct character was continuous self-renewal to perfect virtues.
sentences.chinese: 然而顏淵之本色，在自強不息以進德。

sentences.english: Visitors entered the exhibition hall in a steady stream.
sentences.chinese: 參觀者川流不息地進入展覽廳。

sentences.english: I'll work for the people as long as I live.
sentences.chinese: 只要生命不息，我就將爲人民而工作。

sentences.english: The  infinite sky is motionless overhead And the restless water is  boisterous.
sentences.chinese: 頭上無垠的天空靜止，不息的海水狂暴。

sentences.english: The great mass of trucks and vehicles, the counter streams of hurrying pedestrians, seemed like a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 川流不息的車輛，匆匆來去的行人，象一個迷陣似的。

definition: to grow and multiply without end
hanging by a thread/very precarious/almost extinct/(of sound) linger on faintly
to flow at great speed/to pour/racing current
the stream flows without stopping (idiom); unending flow
(of waves) to surge forward/to roll on in waves/to gallop
lit. the cycle comes back to the start (idiom); to move in circles/the wheel comes full circle
continuous (esp. of mountain ranges)/to stretch long and unbroken/a continuous link/sostenuto (sustained, in music)
to go and come back/to make a return trip/backwards and forwards (e.g. of piston or pump action)/to reciprocate (of machine part)
